_field_block.name: squad specifications

_field_short_integer.name: weight#The relative weight given to this squad spawning

_field_block._field_explanation: When spawning a number of squads from this wave template, try and spawn at least the minimum number, and at most the maximum number. Once these min/max bounds have been met, probabilistic distribution will continue.

_field_char_integer.name: min spawn#Spawn AT LEAST this number of squads. Value of 0 means "no minimum"
max spawn#Spawn NO MORE THAN this number of squads. Value of 0 means "no maximum"

_field_long_enum.name: placement filter#Filter where this squad specification can spawn by matching this value with the values in squad definitions in the scenario
